free.chess
Interface ColoredPiecePainter

All Superinterfaces:
PiecePainter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPiecePainter, free.chess.art.EboardVectorPiecePainter, VectorPiecePainter
public interface ColoredPiecePainter
extends PiecePainter

An extension of the PiecePainter interface which adds methods that allow retrieving and modifying the color of the painted pieces.

Method Summary
 java.awt.Color getBlackColor()
          Returns the color of the black pieces.
 java.awt.Color getBlackOutline()
          Returns the color of the outline for black pieces.
 java.awt.Color getWhiteColor()
          Returns the color of the white pieces.
 java.awt.Color getWhiteOutline()
          Returns the color of the outline for white pieces.
 void setBlackColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the black pieces.
 void setBlackOutline(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the outline on black pieces.
 void setWhiteColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the white pieces.
 void setWhiteOutline(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the outline on white pieces.
 
Methods inherited from interface free.chess.PiecePainter
getPreferredPieceSize, paintPiece
